p: In order to understand our finding, a literature research about the composition of clove essential oil was carried out. Eugenol is actually the major constituent of clove essential oil, it is a hydroxyphenyl propene that demonstrated a great biological activity with an antimicrobial action on oral pathogens ( 27, 28). These results suggest that Eugenol could be used in toothpastes and mouthwashes especially for patients with fixed orthodontic appliances instead of Sodium Fluoride.
